name: SwapRob
description:
You have gone to far!
Trying to rob from HIMSELF, the "High-Tech International Museum of Sience Education, Learning and Fun" was a to big coup. But, who cares?

Grab as many paintings as you can and bring them back to the Ventilation Grid to earn money.
But beware, the guards are piling up and for some reason the room is getting,... bigger!

Oh, and did i mention the nice gadgets you have?
Move with [WASD]/[Arrow Keys] and combine that with the [Shift] Key to shift the entire room! Or, just stay there and press [Spacebar] to become one with your surroundings!

Known Bugs Feature: 

The Difficulty Curve is calculated wrong... Have Fun :-)

Credits: Music - MuseNet
Effects: jsfxr
